Package com.alexkasko.springjdbc.parallel

Interface Summary
ParallelQueriesExceptionHandler Exception handler for exceptions propagated from worker threads to caller thread.
ParallelQueriesListener Implementors must be registered on iterator using ParallelQueriesIterator.addListener(ParallelQueriesListener) method.
RowMapperFactory<T,P extends SqlParameterSource> Spring's row mappers haven't access to query params.
 

Class Summary
ParallelQueriesIterator<T> Executes single SQL query to multiple data sources in parallel using provided executor.
 

Exception Summary
ParallelQueriesException Exception for errors in async query workers
